thread.title: Best, worst and funniest Yelp reviews of haunted houses in San Antonio -
thread.title_full: Best, worst and funniest Yelp reviews of haunted houses in San Antonio - San Antonio Express-News

author: Rebecca Salinas
title: Best, worst and funniest Yelp reviews of haunted houses in San Antonio -
text:
Photo: Brandy Rae Perez, File Image 1 of / 78 78 When reviewing haunted houses in San Antonio, Yelp reviewers don’t hold back. Apparently some attractions are “horrible” or downright scary. Keep clicking to view the best, worst and funniest Yelp reviews of San Antonio’s haunted houses. When reviewing haunted houses in San Antonio, Yelp reviewers don’t hold back. Apparently some attractions are “horrible” or downright scary. Keep clicking to view the best, worst and funniest Yelp ... more Photo: Brandy Rae Perez, File Image 2 of 78 The 13th Floor Haunted House : 3.5/5 stars
"I was more afraid I was going to pass out from the heat in there than the actual "monsters." They should change the name from the 13th Floor to THE SAUNA!!" - Evelia T., Houston The 13th Floor Haunted House : 3.5/5 stars
"I was more afraid I was going to pass out from the heat in there than the actual "monsters." They should change the name from the 13th Floor to THE SAUNA!!" - Evelia... Photo: Brandy Rae Perez, Brandy Rae Photography Image 3 of 78 Ripley’s Haunted Adventure : 4/5 stars
"Scared the crap out of my kids It was worth every penny since they were being bad, payback is a (expletive)!" - Ky B., Houston Ripley’s Haunted Adventure : 4/5 stars
"Scared the crap out of my kids It was worth every penny since they were being bad, payback is a (expletive)!" - Ky B., Houston Photo: HELEN L. MONTOYA, SAN ANTONIO EXPRESS-NEWS Image 4 of 78 Great Room Escape : 4.5/5 stars
"Ladies get those long tresses up and everyone dress accordingly. You leave dripping with sweat." - Anita C., New Braunfels Great Room Escape : 4.5/5 stars
"Ladies get those long tresses up and everyone dress accordingly. You leave dripping with sweat." - Anita C., New Braunfels Photo: Facebook Screenshots Image 5 of 78 The 13th Floor Haunted House : 3.5/5 stars
" !!! That is a direct Quote: from me last night." - Laura P., Frisco The 13th Floor Haunted House : 3.5/5 stars
" !!! That is a direct Quote: from me last night." - Laura P., Frisco Photo: Brandy Rae Perez, Brandy Rae Photography Image 6 of 78 The 13th Floor Haunted House : 3.5/5 stars "FUN, FUN, FUN " - Maria R., Corpus Christi The 13th Floor Haunted House : 3.5/5 stars "FUN, FUN, FUN " - Maria R., Corpus Christi Photo: By Yvonne Zamora, For MySA.com Image 7 of 78 Fearesta : 3/5 stars
"Horrible... While waiting, they offered a fire show - also lame - and a very strange fella doing weird stuff..." - Lori A., Hutto Fearesta : 3/5 stars
"Horrible... While waiting, they offered a fire show - also lame - and a very strange fella doing weird stuff..." - Lori A., Hutto Photo: Facebook Screenshots Image 8 of 78 The 13th Floor Haunted House : 3.5/5 stars
"I don't know what possessed me to go to a haunted house, but I had delusions that I could handle whatever they threw at me. Clearly, I was not ready for what 13th Floor Haunted House had in store." - Jessica N., Austin The 13th Floor Haunted House : 3.5/5 stars
"I don't know what possessed me to go to a haunted house, but I had delusions that I could handle whatever they threw at me. Clearly, I was not ready for what 13th... Photo: Brandy Rae Perez, Brandy Rae Photography Image 9 of 78 Ripley’s Haunted Adventure : 4/5 stars
"If you like gross things and people jumping out at you and no way of getting out, this is great." - Melody F., Houston Ripley’s Haunted Adventure : 4/5 stars
"If you like gross things and people jumping out at you and no way of getting out, this is great." - Melody F., Houston Photo: KIN MAN HUI /SAN ANTONIO EXPRESS-NEWS Image 10 of 78 The 13th Floor Haunted House : 3.5/5 stars
"This haunted house is so not scary. It is very campy, the actors aren't very good and I ended up laughing most of the way through." - Alethea A., San Antonio The 13th Floor Haunted House : 3.5/5 stars
"This haunted house is so not scary. It is very campy, the actors aren't very good and I ended up laughing most of the way through." - Alethea A., San Antonio Photo: Brandy Rae Perez, Brandy Rae Photography Image 11 of 78 Terror Mansion : 5/5 stars
"I LOVE this place. I love all things paranormal and while I am not a fan of being startled, this house goes way beyond the chainsaws and characters jumping out at you." - Erin P., San Antonio Terror Mansion : 5/5 stars
"I LOVE this place. I love all things paranormal and while I am not a fan of being startled, this house goes way beyond the chainsaws and characters jumping out at you." - Erin P.,... Photo: Terror Mansion Image 12 of 78 Fearesta: 3/5 stars
"I thought this place was scary... I won't give too much away about the rooms themselves, but the attention to detail was definitely there." - Charles B., Irving Fearesta: 3/5 stars
"I thought this place was scary... I won't give too much away about the rooms themselves, but the attention to detail was definitely there." - Charles B., Irving Photo: Facebook Screenshots Image 13 of 78 Ripley’s Haunted Adventure : 4/5 stars
"Although it was fun going through the haunted house, it's definitely more for kids than adults ... It ended up being more funny than scary" - Anna F., Oklahoma City, Okla. Ripley’s Haunted Adventure : 4/5 stars
"Although it was fun going through the haunted house, it's definitely more for kids than adults ... It ended up being more funny than scary" - Anna F., Oklahoma City,... Photo: Tom Reel /San Antonio Express-News Image 14 of 78 Great Room Escape : 4.5/5 stars
"The best time! It's the scariest, most thrilling hour of your life." - Abigail S., Pasadena Great Room Escape : 4.5/5 stars
"The best time! It's the scariest, most thrilling hour of your life." - Abigail S., Pasadena Photo: Facebook Screenshots Image 15 of 78 This is what it looks like to be scared as hell (or completely unimpressed) at The 13th Floor Haunted House in San Antonio. Hauntworld Magazine ... more Photo: Brandy Rae Perez Image 78 of 78 Best, worst and funniest Yelp reviews of haunted houses in San Antonio 1 / 78 Back to Gallery San Antonio residents and visitors can look forward to sweating, laughing and screaming when visiting local haunted houses this year. At least that’s what Yelp reviewers had to say.
The biggest names in the game, including the 13th Floor, Terror Mansion, Fearesta and Ripley’s Haunted Adventure, are already open and attracting visitors this season.
But being in South Texas and still coming off summer, a number of reviewers were more concerned about how hot the houses felt, including one that seemed like a "sauna."
Even though we're in mid-October, apparently the scorching heat scares more people than the monsters do.
